## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `npm run check` and fixed all issues

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested on mobile devices (if applicable)

### Build & Deploy

- [ ] `npm run build` completes successfully
- [ ] `npm run preview` works as expected
- [ ] Bundle size is acceptable (check with `npm run size:check`)
- [ ] No new dependencies added (or justified if added)

### Security

- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords) in code
- [ ] Input validation added where needed
- [ ] XSS protection considered
